# ðŸ“š Chat with Document on Slack â€“ RAG System


## -> **Purpose:** This system enables intelligent document-based question answering directly inside Slack. 

## -> It allows users to upload PDF documents in a Slack channel, automatically processes and chunks the document content using AI, generates semantic embeddings, and stores them in a Pinecone vector database. 

## -> When users ask questions, the system retrieves the most relevant document chunks and generates accurate, context-aware answers using a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) approach.

## -> **Tech Stack:** The solution uses Pinecone as the vector store for embedding storage and similarity search, Google Gemini for both generating embeddings and powering the large language model, and Slack as the primary interface for document ingestion and conversational interaction.

## Slack Trigger

â€¢ Listens to Slack messages and detects file uploads (subtype = file_share)  

â€¢ Acts as the single entry point for document ingestion

## **Switch Node** 

â€¢ Ensures the Slack message actually contains uploaded files  

â€¢ Prevents ingestion from running on non-file events

## **Get a File** 

â€¢ Fetches detailed metadata for the uploaded file using file ID  

â€¢ Provides secure download URLs and file information

## **HTTP Request** 

â€¢ Downloads the actual file binary from Slackâ€™s private URL
  
â€¢ Converts the uploaded file into processable binary data

## Extract From File

â€¢ Extracts raw text content from the PDF document  

â€¢ Converts the file into machine-readable text

## Clean Text

â€¢ Normalizes whitespace and removes formatting noise  

â€¢ Improves chunking quality and embedding accuracy

## Attach Metadata

â€¢ Attaches file-level metadata to the document text  

â€¢ Enables traceability and filtering during retrieval

## Pinecone Vector Store to Chunk

â€¢ Stores document embeddings into the Pinecone index  

â€¢ Makes document knowledge retrievable for Q&A

## Clean Query

â€¢ Removes bot mentions and Slack formatting 

 
â€¢ Produces a clean user question for retrieval

## Question & Answer Chain

â€¢ Injects retrieved document context into the prompt  

â€¢ Enforces answering strictly from the provided context

## Send Message

â€¢ Sends the final answer back to the Slack channel  

â€¢ Completes the document-based Q&A flow

## Token Splitter

â€¢ Splits long text into smaller overlapping chunks  

â€¢ Preserves semantic context across chunks

## Default Data Loader

â€¢ Converts text chunks into LangChain document objects  

â€¢ Prepares structured data for embedding

## Google Vector Embeddings

â€¢ Converts document chunks into vector embeddings  

â€¢ Encodes semantic meaning for similarity search

## Embeddings to Retrieve

â€¢ Converts the user question into a vector embedding  

â€¢ Aligns the query with document embeddings

## Pinecone Vector Store (Knowledge Source)

â€¢ Connects to the Pinecone index containing document vectors  

â€¢ Acts as the knowledge source for retrieval

## Vector Store Retriever

â€¢ Retrieves top-K relevant document chunks using similarity search  

â€¢ Supplies contextual data for grounded answers

## LLM - Generate Response

â€¢ Generates a natural language answer using the LLM  
â€¢ Grounds the response in retrieved document content
